tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_policies ( 
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    policy_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    policy_description TEXT, 
    implementation_date DATE, 
    regulatory_body VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE policy_audit_logs(
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_performed VARCHAR(50),
    policy_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name TEXT,
    policy_description TEXT,
    issue_date DATE,
    last_updated DATE
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_changes (
    change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    change_description TEXT,
    change_date DATE,
    change_type TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES regulatory_policies(policy_id)
)

CREATE TABLE policy_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    change_id INT,
    history_date DATE,
    history_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES regulatory_policies(policy_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (change_id) REFERENCES regulatory_changes(change_id)
)

CREATE TABLE policy_changes (
  change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  change_type VARCHAR(50),
  change_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES regulatory_policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE policy_audit_log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  change_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES regulatory_policies(policy_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (change_id) REFERENCES policy_changes(change_id)
);

CREATE TABLE policy_comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  comment_text TEXT,
  commenter_name VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES regulatory_policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_policies (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  policy_description TEXT,
  effective_date DATE,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE policy_changes (
  change_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT REFERENCES regulatory_policies(id),
  change_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  change_description TEXT,
  change_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_agencies (
  agency_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  agency_address TEXT,
  contact_person VARCHAR(150),
  contact_email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE policy_audit_log (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT REFERENCES regulatory_policies(id),
  action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  action_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE policy_review_comments (
  comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT REFERENCES regulatory_policies(id),
  user_name VARCHAR(100),
  comment_text TEXT,
  comment_date DATE
)
